channel.title: 🏢 Institute of Science and Technology Austria on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Institute of Science and Technology Austria on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: The Iterative Optimal Brain Surgeon: Faster Sparse Recovery by Leveraging Second-Order Information
item.description: I-OBS, a novel family of sparse recovery algorithms leveraging second-order information, achieves faster convergence rates for sparse DNNs, validated by large-scale experiments.
